projects.title: Google STEP Internship
projects.desc: An unforgettable summer in New York City eating food, making memories, and building new features in Google Ads. My tech stack was Angular, Java, Dart, HTML, and CSS.

projects.title: Milkcee Studios
projects.desc: What you're looking at right now! Started as a winter break project and built up little by little. Created from scratch with SvelteKit, TypeScript, and Sass.
